attributes.action: prevent credit card details being passed between companies without explicit permission from the cardholder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After sending flowers through Interflora I found that my credit card account was being charged by a shoppers discount club. This club had been given my card details by Interflora without my express permission and yet the only way I could stop it was by cancelling my card. This should be illegal. Claiming implied permission hidden in small print should be illegal and classed as fraud.
